subject: Horses
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: When it comes to the Westchester Cup, a competition between the U.S. and Britain dating to 1886 and held only twice since 1939, bragging rights are long-lived.
snippet: When it comes to the Westchester Cup, a competition between the U.S. and Britain dating to 1886 and held only twice since 1939, bragging rights are long-lived.
